name: Ice Surge

souljades.name: Successive Ice Blast
souljades.description: Ice Blasts will occur 3 times in succession for a total of 685% of your Attack.

souljades.name: Frozen Blast
souljades.description: +35% Ice Blast DMG and reduces Ice Blast cooldown to 4 seconds.

souljades.name: Depths Blast
souljades.description: Ice Blasts will build a large amount of Frostbite on yourself.

souljades.name: Element Surge • Ice-Wielding
souljades.description: +15% Attack bonus and +50% Frostbite Accumulation Rate. Frost Surge activates when your Frostbite meter fills.

souljades.name: Chill Spike
souljades.description: During Frost Surge, using a Skill will summon an Ice Thorn dealing 910% of your Attack, with a cooldown of 4 seconds.

souljades.name: Frostbite Chain
souljades.description: After 15 instances of Ice Blasts, your next uncharged melee attack will activate Chain Crush, dealing 3290% of your Attack.

curios.name: Wordless Sutra
curios.description: Chain Crush will deal x1.8 damage.
curios.awakening: Chain Crush can execute enemies below 8% of max Health.

curios.name: Verve Banner
curios.description: While in Element Surge state, weapon attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & +10% Life steal.
curios.awakening: While in Element Surge state, all attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & 10% Life steal.

description: Attacks will accumulate Frostbite on enemies, causing Ice Blasts. After 2 Ice Blasts, your Frostbite will fill, activating Frost Surge. During Frost Surge, using a Skill will summon an Ice Thorn that deals 910% of your Attack as Ice Blast DMG on a 4 second cooldown. After 15 Ice Blasts, your next uncharged melee attack will trigger Chain Crush, dealing 3290% of your Attack as Ice Blast DMG.

name: Bow • Poison Surge

souljades.name: Scattershot Enhance
souljades.description: Bow will fire 5 arrows instead of 3, increasing its spread, damage and Deadeye charge.

souljades.name: Desperation
souljades.description: Bow's Stage 2 Charged Attacks will explode for more damage and Deadeye charge.

souljades.name: Element Surge • Poison-Wielding
souljades.description: +20% Attack bonus and +25% Poison Blast DMG bonus. Toxin Surge doesn't activate normally with this build.

souljades.name: Pestilent Pool
souljades.description: Poison Blasts summon Toxic Pools applying up to 2 Toxified Stacks to enemies within.

souljades.name: Miasma Drive
souljades.description: +25% Attack for 18s after applying Toxified to an enemy.

souljades.name: Backfire
souljades.description: +20% Attack at the cost of 4% of damage dealt to self.

curios.name: Tideforce Bead
curios.description: Activating a number of Elemental Bursts will summon Water Spears dealing 5400% of your Attack.
curios.awakening: Number of Elemental Bursts required reduced to 3.

curios.name: Prevailing Robe
curios.description: When Armor goes below 30%, repair 60% of max Armor over 3s with a 10s cooldown.
curios.awakening: Gain +15% DMG Bonus while Armor is full.

description:
Deal massive damage by using the Stage 2 Charged Attack of your Bow. Perfectly timing the release of the charge, while Deadeye is active, will cast Void Destroyer, a massive 3-part attack that only consumes 1 ammo. Beware, this build will leave you at 1 Health, so you'll mainly rely on your Armor to survive any hits.

Reaching ~8.5% Deadeye build rate will allow you to activate Deadeye with just 3 Stage 2 Charged Attacks instead of 4. 30.5%+ Deadeye build rate will allow you to activate Deadeye in 2 Stage 2 Charged Attacks if they're headshots. 43.9%+ Deadeye build rate will allow you to activate Deadeye in 2 Stage 2 Charged Attacks as long as one is a headshot.

name: Valda • Thunder Scorch

souljades.name: Thunderpull
souljades.description: +20% Attack and successful attacks will build Thundershock on yourself.

souljades.name: Thunder Counter
souljades.description: Enables the ability to parry Divine Thunder strikes.

souljades.name: Thunderproof
souljades.description: Reduces your max Thundershock by 25% and Divine Thunder will no longer stagger you.

souljades.name: Element Surge • Poison-Wielding
souljades.description: Musket shots will deal Frostbite DMG over time, greatly increasing Ice accumulation rate and Deadeye build rate.

souljades.name: Incineration
souljades.description: +25% Attack for 10s after activating Hydroflare, but apply a Burn to yourself.

souljades.name: Backfire
souljades.description: +20% Attack, but 4% of your damage dealt will be dealt to yourself. Backlash effect disabled when below 25% Health.

curios.name: Sea Leveler
curios.description: Nezha's Might will apply a major Burn per hit.
curios.awakening: Nezha's Might summons fireballs in front of you dealing Hit damage and Burn damage.

curios.name: Verve Banner
curios.description: While in Element Surge state, weapon attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & +10% Life steal.
curios.awakening: While in Element Surge state, all attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & 10% Life steal.

description: Your attacks will build Thundershock on you overtime. When your Thundershock meter fills, 4 strikes Divine Thunder will land on you, in which you can parry. Valda's ability applies a unique version of Soak that doesn't expire early from Hydroflare. By combining this with a Musket shot before Divine Thunder activates, you can activate up to 4 full Scorchings in quick succession, dealing massive damage.

name: Scorch Skill Surge

souljades.name: Thunderpull
souljades.description: +20% Attack and successful attacks will build Thundershock on yourself.

souljades.name: Thunder Counter
souljades.description: Enables the ability to parry Divine Thunder strikes.

souljades.name: Element Surge • Ice-Wielding
souljades.description: +15% Attack bonus and +50% Frostbite Accumulation on enemies.

souljades.name: Draco Stride
souljades.description: Dodges will summon a wave 0.5s after, applying Soak to enemies hit.

souljades.name: Incineration
souljades.description: +25% Attack for 10s after activating Hydroflare, but apply a Burn to yourself

souljades.name: Thunderproof
souljades.description: Reduces your max Thundershock by 25% and Divine Thunder will no longer stagger you.

curios.name: Tideforce Bead
curios.description: Activating a number of Elemental Bursts will summon Water Spears dealing 5400% of your Attack.
curios.awakening: Number of Elemental Bursts required reduced to 3.

curios.name: Verve Banner
curios.description: While in Element Surge state, weapon attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & +10% Life steal.
curios.awakening: While in Element Surge state, all attacks are granted +60% Rage/DMG & 10% Life steal.

description: Your attacks will build Thundershock on you overtime. Damaging Skills and Ultimates will build large amounts of Thundershock. When your Thundershock meter fills, Divine Thunder will activate, sending four thunderbolts down on you. You can parry these bolts to activate Scorching, which will apply a massive Burn dealing 5400% of your Attack as Burn DMG over 18 seconds to your next weapon attack. When an enemy is Burning and Soaked, Hydroflare will activate, dealing the remaining Burn damage instantly. You can apply Soak by either dodging near an enemy to hit them with Draco Stride or by activating an Elemental Burst.

souljades.name: Thunder Counter
souljades.description: Enables the ability to parry Divine Thunder strikes.

souljades.name: Element Surge • Thunder-Wielding
souljades.description: +12% Attack bonus and +55% Divine Thunder DMG bonus. When Thundershock is full, will activate Thunder Surge.

souljades.description: During Thunder Surge, everytime you deal 10x your Attack with a Weapon, will summon a strike of Divine Thunder on yourself.

description: Your attacks will build Thundershock on you overtime. When your Thundershock meter fills, Thunder Surge will activate, sending a single bolt of Divine Thunder onto you. You can parry this bolt to activate Scorching, which will apply a massive Burn dealing 5400% of your Attack as Burn DMG over 18 seconds to your next weapon attack. When an enemy is Burning and Soaked, Hydroflare will activate, dealing the remaining Burn damage instantly. You can apply Soak by either dodging near an enemy to hit them with Draco Stride or by activating an Elemental Burst.

description: Your attacks will build Thundershock on you overtime. When your Thundershock meter fills, Thunder Surge will activate, sending a single bolt of Divine Thunder onto you. You can parry this bolt to deal a strong counterstrike. During Kylin's Ultimate, his counterstrikes are significantly enhanced, dealing 5200% of your Attack as Melee & Skill DMG. As you lose more Health in your Ultimate, you'll get an additional DMG Bonus, up to 180%.

description: Your attacks will build Thundershock on you overtime. When your Thundershock meter fills, 4 bolts of Divine Thunder will land on you, which you can parry. By implementing dodge cancels, you can apply Scorching up to twice, which does a massive Burn dealing 5400% of your Attack as Burn DMG over 18 seconds to your weapon attacks. When an enemy is Burning and Soaked, Hydroflare will activate, dealing the remaining Burn damage instantly. You can apply Soak by either dodging near an enemy to hit them with Draco Stride or by activating an Elemental Burst.

description: Hitting missiles from your Swarm weapon will build Deadeye. Once full, unlocks a special Deadeye attack called Celestial Patrol Order that shoots a salvo of missiles into the sky landing on an enemy nearby for 6000% of your Attack as Charged Ranged Weapon DMG. You use this attack by fully charging the Swarm before releasing. While in Deadeye, your current charge is conserved while dodging. Swarm's counterstrikes deal great damage and build a large amount of Deadeye, so aim for them when possible.
